entry.title: third-party development boards in Arduino
entry.content:
A fatal error occurred: Failed to connect to ESP32: No serial data received.

Borderless Electronics – Arduino Leonardo – /dev/ttyACM0

Board Name Manufacturer Page Arduino URL Selected Board Selected Port
Keyestudio ESP32 PLUS Development Board https://www.keyestudio.com/products/keyestudio-esp32-plus-development-board-woroom-32-module-wifibluetooth-compatible-with-arduino https://dl.espressif.com/dl/package_esp32_index.json ESP32-WROOM-DA Module /dev/ttyUSB0
Adafruit Feather HUZZAH with ESP8266 https://www.adafruit.com/product/2821 http://arduino.esp8266.com/stable/package_esp8266com_index.json Adafruit Feather HUZZAH ESP8266 /dev/ttyUSB0
entry.summary: a hassel-free guide for setting up Arduino alternatives
